You need to install the php5-cgi package.
After having installed it, you need to go to the configuration file and enable the module.
Ok, type in: sudo lighty-enable-mod fastcgi
And then go to /etc/lighttpd/conf-available/10-fastcgi.conf
In /etc/init.d there's a file called lighttpd.
I forgot to say that you need to edit the file /etc/lighttpd/conf-available/10-fastcgi.conf in which /usr/bin/php5-cgi must be replaced by /usr/bin/php5-cgi.
